snippet: Researchers hope the discoveries, described in two dozen papers released on Wednesday, will eventually lead to a deeper understanding of diseases and new ways to treat or cure them.
abstract: Two dozen studies from federal project, published in journal Nature, describe genetic research discoveries that will eventually lead to greater understanding of diseases and new ways to treat or cure them; discoveries involve complicated system of switches that regulate genes.
lead_paragraph: Researchers hope the discoveries, described in two dozen papers released on Wednesday, will eventually lead to a deeper understanding of diseases and new ways to treat or cure them.

headline.main: Project Sheds Light on What Drives Genes
headline.print_headline: Project Sheds Light on What Drives Genes
